coreCapabilities.adaptiveDescription: Need timed captions for video editing? Choose SRT. Building an accessible web player? VTT is ready. Just need a transcript for analysis? Export as plain TXT. The choice is yours, for every single file.

legal.question: Is it legal to use a YouTube subtitle downloader?
legal.answer: Yes, using a **YouTube subtitle downloader** for personal use, research, accessibility, or educational purposes is generally legal. However, always respect copyright laws and YouTube's terms of service.

transcript.question: Can I download the YouTube transcript as text?
transcript.answer: Yes! Our tool functions as a powerful **YouTube transcript downloader**, allowing you to extract the full video transcript as a clean text file (TXT) for reading, content analysis, or AI processing.

formats.question: What subtitle formats do you support?
formats.answer: We support SRT (SubRip), VTT (WebVTT), and clean TXT formats. SRT is perfect for video editing, VTT for web players, and TXT for AI training and text analysis.

bulk.question: Can I download subtitles from entire YouTube playlists?
bulk.answer: Yes! Our bulk YouTube subtitle downloader can extract captions from entire playlists and channels. This is perfect for creating large datasets for AI training or research projects.

languages.question: Does this work with different languages?
languages.answer: Absolutely! Our tool can download subtitles in any language available on the YouTube video, including auto-generated captions and manually uploaded subtitles.

limits.question: Are there any download limits?
limits.answer: Free users get 5 daily credits for subtitle downloads. Pro members enjoy unlimited bulk downloads for large-scale projects and commercial use.

testimonials.title: Trusted by Professionals Worldwide
testimonials.description: From AI researchers to content creators, see why thousands choose YTVidHub for their subtitle extraction needs.

reviews.name: Sarah Chen
reviews.content: Perfect for creating training datasets. Downloaded 10,000+ YouTube subtitles for our language model research. The bulk processing saved us weeks of work.

reviews.name: Marcus Rodriguez
reviews.content: The best **YouTube subtitle downloader** I've used for Premiere Pro editing. The SRT files work perfectly with my timeline. Clean formatting and accurate timestamps every time.

reviews.name: Dr. Emily Watson
reviews.content: Essential **caption downloader** for making content accessible. The VTT format works seamlessly with our web players. Reliable and fast processing.

reviews.name: Alex Kim
reviews.content: Saves hours of manual transcription work. The AI summary feature is incredibly useful for creating video descriptions and blog posts.

schema.name: YTVidHub - YouTube Subtitle Downloader
schema.description: Professional YouTube subtitle downloader for single videos and bulk playlist extraction. Download SRT, VTT, TXT subtitles for AI training and content creation.

faq.q1: How do I download YouTube subtitles for free?
faq.a1: YTVidHub is a free YouTube subtitle downloader that allows you to extract captions from individual videos or download them in bulk from playlists. Simply paste the YouTube URL and choose your preferred format (SRT, VTT, or TXT).
faq.q2: Can I download YouTube playlist subtitles in bulk?
faq.a2: Yes! Our bulk YouTube subtitle downloader can extract subtitles from entire playlists and channels. Pro plans support unlimited bulk downloads for large-scale projects.
faq.a3: Our YouTube subtitle downloader supports SRT (SubRip), VTT (WebVTT), and clean TXT formats. Choose the format that best fits your needs: SRT for video players, VTT for web, or TXT for AI training.
faq.q4: Does it work with YouTube's auto-generated subtitles?
faq.a4: Yes, our YouTube transcript downloader can extract both manually uploaded subtitles and YouTube's auto-generated captions in all available languages.
faq.q5: Is there a limit on how many YouTube subtitles I can download?
faq.a5: Free users get 5 daily credits for subtitle downloads. Pro members enjoy unlimited bulk extraction of YouTube subtitles for large-scale AI training and content creation projects.

formats.title: Supported Subtitle Formats
formats.description: Choose the perfect format for your workflow. Each format is optimized for different use cases.

srt.title: SRT Format
srt.description: The industry standard format for subtitles with precise timestamps. Perfect for video editing and media players.

vtt.title: VTT Format
vtt.description: Modern web format with support for advanced styling. Ideal for web players and online applications.

txt.title: TXT Format
txt.description: Clean plain text without timestamps. Perfect for AI training, text analysis, and content creation.

1.description: Copy and paste the URL of the YouTube video you want to extract subtitles from.
